data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Vaslui to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vaslui, Romania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help 74 new simple churches start among the 371,200 people in the state of Vaslui, Romania. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 15 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Vaslui to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Vaslui, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Vaslui, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, encourage the 23,496 believers in Vaslui to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Vaslui.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
